com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.locale

Class DynamicLocaleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.locale.DynamicLocaleUtils

  • public class DynamicLocaleUtils
extends Object
    Helper class to perform various locale operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static String ADE_LOCALE_SPLIT

      Constant value for the system locale.

      Constant value for the Turkish (Türkçe) locale.

        See Also:

      • isLayoutRtl

        public static boolean isLayoutRtl()
        Checks whether the layout is Right to Left.
        Returns:
        true if the layout is Right to Left.
        See Also:
        ViewCompat#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL

      • toLocale

        public static Locale toLocale(String locale)
        Get locale from the locale string in the format: language,region.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale string to be converted.
        Returns:
        The converted locale from the locale string.

        Return null for the default locale value.

        See Also:
        ADS_LOCALE_SYSTEM

      • getDefaultLocale

        public static Locale getDefaultLocale(Context context,
                                      String[] supportedLocales)
        Get default locale language from the supported locales.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to get configuration.
        supportedLocales - The supported locales.
        Returns:
        The default locale according to the supported locales.

      • getLocale

        public static Locale getLocale(Locale locale,
                               Locale defaultLocale)
        Returns the locale after performing safety checks.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale to be checked.
        defaultLocale - The default locale if current locale does not passes checks.
        Returns:
        The locale after performing safety checks.

      • setLocale

        public static Context setLocale(Context context,
                                Locale locale)
        Set the locale for a given context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to set locale
        locale - The locale to be used for the context.
        Returns:
        The modified context after applying the locale.
